root: ^*You enter the building, where Stephen’s apartment is located. You pass by the bodyguard near the entrance, who only nods at you. Through the elevator, you get to the right floor and leave straight in the flat.*
^*You’ve been here multiple times before. A modern living room with panoramic windows and semi-circular sofas. Everything maintained in subdued colors. And thoroughly cleaned.*
^*You guess that the security must have cleaned up after searching through the flat. You decide to look around.*
